files.source: Maryland Department of Planning / SDAT CAMA Data
files.description: Statewide property assessment data - 1,274 hotels/motels/B&Bs with room counts but NO NAMES (parcel IDs only)
Hotel tax filings - 173 hotels with taxable amounts

notes: Parcel data has room counts but no hotel names. Would need to match parcels to business names via address geocoding.
